name: Unica Living Subsidy
description:
Every Land Owner of Unica receives a 150â‚¬ grant per day that they can spend on furniture and T3+ building materials for their plot in Unica. Any rent expenses for people not owning a capital plot is also paid this way.
Any furniture bought to be resold or not for their plot of unica constitutes abuse of this law.

properties.Title: Furniture & Over T3 Building Materials Subsidy
properties.UserDescription:
Case 1: the transaction can be subsidized in full by the remaining amount
Case 2: the transaction cannot be subsidized in full by the remaining amount

Citizen.tooltip:
When triggered, the <ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon> value of the event will be used.

<ecoicon item="User">Buyer</ecoicon>: The buying player.
